airdropERC1155(address,(address,uint256,.details: The token-owner should approve airdrop tokenIds and amounts to this contract.                   Can only be called by contract owner.

params._contents: List containing recipients, tokenIds, and amounts to airdrop
params._tokenAddress: Address of the ERC1155 token being airdropped

airdropERC1155WithSignature((bytes32,add.details: The token-owner should approve airdrop tokenIds and amounts to this contract.                   Signer should be the contract owner.

params.req: Struct containing airdrop contents, uid, and expiration timestamp
params.signature: EIP-712 signature to perform the airdrop

airdropERC20(address,(address,uint256)[].details: The token-owner should approve total airdrop amount to this contract.                   Can only be called by contract owner.

params._contents: List containing recipients and amounts to airdrop
params._tokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 token being airdropped

airdropERC20WithSignature((bytes32,addre.details: The token-owner should approve airdrop amounts to this contract.                   Signer should be the contract owner.

params.req: Struct containing airdrop contents, uid, and expiration timestamp
params.signature: EIP-712 signature to perform the airdrop

airdropERC721(address,(address,uint256)[.details: The token-owner should approve airdrop tokenIds to this contract.                   Can only be called by contract owner.

params._contents: List containing recipients and tokenIds to airdrop
params._tokenAddress: Address of the ERC721 token being airdropped

airdropERC721WithSignature((bytes32,addr.details: The token-owner should approve airdrop tokenIds to this contract.                   Signer should be the contract owner.

params.req: Struct containing airdrop contents, uid, and expiration timestamp
params.signature: EIP-712 signature to perform the airdrop

airdropNativeToken((address,uint256)[]).details: Owner should send total airdrop amount as msg.value.                   Can only be called by contract owner.

params._contents: List containing recipients and amounts to airdrop

claimERC1155(address,address,uint256,uin.details: The token-owner should approve tokenIds and total airdrop amounts to this contract,                   and set merkle root of allowlisted address for this airdrop.

params._quantity: Allowlisted quantity of tokens to claim
params._receiver: Allowlisted address for which the token is being claimed

claimERC20(address,address,uint256,bytes.details: The token-owner should approve total airdrop amount to this contract,                   and set merkle root of allowlisted address for this airdrop.

params._quantity: Allowlisted quantity of tokens to claim
params._receiver: Allowlisted address for which the token is being claimed

claimERC721(address,address,uint256,byte.details: The token-owner should approve airdrop tokenIds to this contract,                   and set merkle root of allowlisted address for this airdrop.

params._receiver: Allowlisted address for which the token is being claimed

params._resetClaimStatus: Reset claim status / amount claimed so far to zero for all recipients

params._newOwner: The address to set as the new owner of the contract.

airdropERC1155(address,(address,uint256,.notice: Lets contract owner send ERC1155 tokens to a list of addresses.

airdropERC1155WithSignature((bytes32,add.notice: Lets contract owner send ERC1155 tokens to a list of addresses with EIP-712 signature.

airdropERC20(address,(address,uint256)[].notice: Lets contract owner send ERC20 tokens to a list of addresses.

airdropERC20WithSignature((bytes32,addre.notice: Lets contract owner send ERC20 tokens to a list of addresses with EIP-712 signature.

airdropERC721(address,(address,uint256)[.notice: Lets contract owner send ERC721 tokens to a list of addresses.

airdropERC721WithSignature((bytes32,addr.notice: Lets contract owner send ERC721 tokens to a list of addresses with EIP-712 signature.

airdropNativeToken((address,uint256)[]).notice: Lets contract-owner send native token (eth) to a list of addresses.

claimERC1155(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Lets allowlisted addresses claim ERC1155 airdrop tokens.

claimERC20(address,address,uint256,bytes.notice: Lets allowlisted addresses claim ERC20 airdrop tokens.

claimERC721(address,address,uint256,byte.notice: Lets allowlisted addresses claim ERC721 airdrop tokens.

isClaimed(address,address,uint256).notice: Returns claim status of a receiver for a claim based airdrop

owner().notice: Returns the owner of the contract.

setMerkleRoot(address,bytes32,bool).notice: Lets contract owner set merkle root (allowlist) for claim based airdrops.

setOwner(address).notice: Lets an authorized wallet set a new owner for the contract.
